title: The Puritan revolution: Cromwell and the rise of parliamentary democracy
creator_credit: Irving Allen, Columbia Pictures, Learning Corporation of America and Ken Hughes
brief_description: Shows how Parliament’s revolt, led by Cromwell and the puritans, erupts into full-scale civil war. When Charles is executed the absolute power of the monarchy ends and the nation is set on the road to parliamentary democracy. Specially edited from the film ‘Cromwell” starring Richard Harris as Cromwell and Alec Guiness as Charles I.
